name: Witch Hunt (itch) (Sir0Kuhl)
description:
Sadly couln't finish it in time...
There actually should be a little story, that fits the theme of the jam.
Just couldn't implement it.

BUT HEY! YOU CAN KILL HUNDRETS OF BAD GUYS WITH FIRE BALLS!

Controls:
W & A: Run
Space / A: Jump
Mouse: Aim
Left Mouse: Shoot

Game made in Godot
Graphics made in Aseprite
